column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I think I am just not a fan of deep dish cause I finally got around to trying Malnatti's classic and was unimpressed. This was a delivery order so maybe it is better served on site. The tomato sauce was barely ok
column2: the sausage patty was the worst bit
column3: and the butter crush was good but didn't rewarm well. Coming from a sauce/sausage/butter fan
column4: this is abysmal. Where did it all go wrong?
